PH093 - The Temperance Work (1908)


                                  May 24, 1908. 

             The Temperance Watchman 

     God bids his people blend harmoniously in their service for him, that they may work in Christ's lines. This last message of warning must be brought to the world; and there are continual calls for those who will go forth and carry the message to the missionary fields that are calling for help. There are some who cannot themselves go to these fields, but they can help with their means in the support of the work.
